EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #1.2021 Dealer Update #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - December 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | December 2020 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2021-01 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-01 - ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-855 Radios.pdf]]> ADS-B Upgrade with Primus II RM 855 RMU - 2021-02 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-02 - ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-850.pdf]]> ADS-B Upgrade with Primus II RM 850 RMU - 2021-03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-03 - CD-830 Control Display Unit for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> CD 830 Control Display Unit for Business Aviation - Mk III to Mk II%2B PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> PM-CPDLC Upgrade Mk III to Mk II Plus - 2021-07 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-07 - Mk III FANS 1 A Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> FANS 1/A+ Operation Upgrade - BBJ ACJ ADS-B Out Upgrade Sales Bulletin.pdf]]> BBJ ACJ ADS-B Out Upgrades - 2021-14 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-14 SmartRunway SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> RAAS/SmartRunway/SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft - DU-1310 Display Replacement.pdf]]> DU 1310 Display Replacement - 2021-24 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-24 Satcom High Data Rate for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Satcom High Data Rate for Business Aviation -
